components.name: nextButtonActionScript
components.label: Action Script
components.description: Enter custom code that will be executed when the button is clicked. Global variables that are provided are 'data' - the state, 'moment' - moment object, 'form' - form instance, 'formMode' - form mode, 'axios' - to make http requests, and allows you to access the data of any form component, by using its API key.

exposedVariables.name: http
exposedVariables.description: The axios instance for making http requests

exposedVariables.name: result
exposedVariables.description: only available after a successful http post

exposedVariables.name: globalState
exposedVariables.description: The global state of the application

exposedVariables.name: setGlobalState
exposedVariables.description: Set the global state of the application e.g. `setGlobalState({ key, data });`

components.name: nextEventName
components.label: Event name
components.description: This is the event that will be published when the button is dispatched

components.name: nextUniqueStateId
components.label: Unique State ID
components.description: This is the unique state id to execute an action against. This is very important if you want to execute a predefined action, which is attached to the global state. This actions are executed using PubSub mechanism, which needs a unique ID of the provider you want to manipulate. Without this, an action will not be executed.

components.name: nextCustomEventNameToDispatch
components.label: Custom Event
components.description: This is the custom event that will be published when the button is clicked

components.name: onNextClicked
components.label: On Next Clicked
components.description: Enter custom even handler on changing of event. (form, event) are exposed

exposedVariables.name: globalState
exposedVariables.description: The global state of the application

exposedVariables.name: http
exposedVariables.description: axios instance used to make http requests

exposedVariables.name: message
exposedVariables.description: This is the Ant API for displaying toast messages. See: https://ant.design/components/message/#header

components.name: style
components.label: Style
components.description: A script that returns the style of the element as an object. This should conform to CSSProperties

components.name: customVisibility
components.label: Custom Visibility
components.description: Enter custom visibility code.  You must return true to show the component. The global variable data is provided, and allows you to access the data of any form component, by using its API key.

components.name: customEnabled
components.label: Custom Enabled
components.description: Enter custom enabled code.  You must return true to enable the component. The global variable data is provided, and allows you to access the data of any form component, by using its API key.
